Deemos converts to mech vulture and follows. Arrow becomes a motorcycle and=
 Spider a... spider, and they too follow Razor. Spider very cocky, Deemos p=
lanning strategy, and Arrow imagining all of the beings he was going to har=
m...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: RoboRick007
  To: Neo Beast Wa=
rs
  Sent: Tuesday, October 29, 2002 8:41 PM
  Subject: nWo orders


  : : =
Razor : :

  Razor glances at the computers once more and sees that the Pre=
dacons were dangerously close to the Maximal base.

  Razor: No more time f=
or talk guys. Judgement call. We are going to move to the Maximal base. Int=
ercept as many Predacons as you can. Make sure you concentrate on Hydras Pr=
edacons. We are aiding the Maximals as well as Tyrael and Cygnar's forces. =
Oh, and leave a mark!

  Razor transformes and starts to fly out towards th=
e maximal base.

  Razor: nWo, let loose the dogs of war!

  : : Diesel : :=


  Diesel: Sting, Hollywood, and the rest of you, you have your orders. MO=
VE OUT!

  Diesel transformes to truck mode and heads out himself.


------=

  New World Order
